text: فَلَمَّا رَءَآ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ لَا تَصِلُ إِلَيۡهِ نَكِرَهُمۡ وَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِيفَةٗۚ قَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِ لُوطٖ

translation.en: But when he saw their hands not reaching for it, he distrusted them and felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not. We have been sent to the people of Lot
translation.id: Maka ketika dilihatnya tangan mereka tidak menjamahnya, dia (Ibrahim) mencurigai mereka, dan merasa takut kepada mereka. Mereka (malaikat) berkata, "Jangan takut, sesungguhnya kami diutus kepada kaum Luṭ
